de.hsb.ms.syn.common.interfaces

Class DesktopConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.interfaces.Connection
      • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.interfaces.DesktopConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DesktopBluetoothConnection, DesktopSimonConnection

    public abstract class DesktopConnection
extends Connection
    Connection sub-facade for Desktop-specific connections. It extends the Connection class with several methods unique to Desktop/Host devices
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
